hero.badge: Maximize your AI potential with Jaydai
hero.title: Your Smart AI Assistant for
hero.subtitle: Transform how you use ChatGPT with our library of expert prompts, custom templates, and detailed analytics.

features.title: Powerful Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to maximize your AI potential

libraries.title: Official Prompt Libraries
libraries.description: Access curated collections of expert-crafted prompts organized by use case and industry. Our libraries are constantly updated with the latest techniques and best practices.

companyTemplates.title: Company Templates
companyTemplates.description: Share a customized prompt bank with your entire team for specific business use cases. Standardize AI interactions across your organization and ensure consistent results.

customTemplates.title: Create Custom Templates
customTemplates.description: Build and save your own prompt templates to save time when working on recurring projects. Organize them by category and access them with a single click.

analytics.title: Detailed Analytics
analytics.description: Track your AI usage with comprehensive analytics. Monitor time saved, energy footprint, and effectiveness of different prompt types to optimize your workflow.

aiUpdates.title: AI Advancement Updates
aiUpdates.description: Stay informed about the latest AI developments and how to leverage them. We continuously update our prompt libraries to incorporate new capabilities and techniques.

learningSchool.title: Learning School
learningSchool.description: Access our online learning platform with real-world simulations to master AI prompt engineering. Learn how to craft effective prompts for any situation.

cta.description: Experience all these features and more with our free Chrome extension.

pricing.title: Completely Free for Everyone
pricing.subtitle: Get started today at no cost with all the essential features

freePlan.name: Jaydai Free
freePlan.description: Everything you need to supercharge your AI interactions with expertly crafted prompts.

enterprise.title: Enterprise Solution
enterprise.description: For teams and organizations needing advanced features and support

howItWorks.title: How Jaydai Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Seven simple steps to maximize your AI potential

1.title: Install the Extension
1.description: Add Jaydai to Chrome in just one click from the Chrome Web Store

2.title: Create your account
2.description: Click on "Get Started" and create your account. You can sign up with Google or email.

3.title: Go to ChatGPT
3.description: You will see a new button to access Jaydai in the bottom right corner of the ChatGPT interface.

4.title: Choose Your Prompt
4.description: Select from our library of expert prompts or use your saved templates

5.title: Personalize your prompt
5.description: Replace the variables with your own information to create a personalized prompt

6.title: Watch AI Do the Work
6.description: Get superior results thanks to expertly crafted prompts

7.title: Save your best prompts
7.description: When you find a prompt that works, save it for future use

beforeAfterComparison.title: See the Difference
beforeAfterComparison.subtitle: Compare AI responses with and without Jaydai's optimized prompts
beforeAfterComparison.jaydaiPrompt: "Analyze the top 5 business benefits of implementing AI..."
beforeAfterComparison.instructions: Drag the slider to compare the difference between basic prompts and Jaydai's optimized templates.
